text:
Nadia Toffa (June 10, 1979 – August 13, 2019) was an Italian journalist and television presenter. She worked for the satirical current affairs program "Le Iene". In 2017, hers was the third most searched-for personal name on Google. Toffa was born in Brescia, Italy.
Toffa died on August 13, 2019 from brain cancer at the age of 40.
